title: SOLD: 1952 Dominican Republic Real Photo Postcard Negro League Star Howard Easterling
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1952 Dominican Republic Real Photo Postcard Negro League Star Howard Easterling
posts.post_content: Up for sale today are two extremely rare 1952 Dominican Republic real photo postcards depicting two former Negro League baseball greats, Howard Easterling & Johnny Wright. THE JOHNNY WRIGHT & HOWARD EASTERLING POSTCARDS HAVE BEEN SOLD. Both players are pictured in their Escogido uniforms with crystal clear images and text below the photo identifying issue/distribution dates of June 19, 1952 & June 26, 1952, exactly one week apart. Both cards are in (NRMT) condition and are blank backed. Asking price is $SOLD each with free shipping. Payment via paypal (f/f), please PM me with any questions. First person to contact me and state "I'll take it/them" and send payment is the new owner.
Johnny Wright postcard has sold, Howard Easterling has sold.
